title: Episode 84: Lukas Volger
description: Scared of a vegetarian diet? Have no fear! Lukas Volger, author of “Vegetarian Entrees That Won’t Leave You Hungry” is this week’s guest on Let’s Eat In. Tune in as Cathy Erway speaks with Lukas about vegetarian diets, budget meals and his experience tasting all different types of veggie burgers. Find out what you can do to make sure you’re getting the most out of vegetarian food options and learn more about how reducing meat in your diet can be beneficial for your health AND your wallet! This episode was sponsored by Whole Foods Market.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
